entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:05 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 09:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: ESE 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this afternoon then light snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 09:30 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 09:30 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:30 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
